name: devcp-modern
description: Modern hosting control panel built with React, Node.js, and TypeScript

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup && npm run db:seed

author: DevCP Team
